special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
[b]2 Defense[/b] Stage 2
When this Expedition reaches stage 2, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment. 
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
